actions.name: Spider Lair
actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters combat.

Effect: The user freely uses Sticky Web. Spider Web Hazards created by the user do not affect the user or their allies.

actions.name: Sticky Web
actions.description: Effect: A weave of webs covers all surfaces in the [Blast X] area, with squares that have two or more surfaces covered treating the whole space as having the Hazard, not just the surfaces. Each time an enemy creature moves through a space and touches the Hazard, they lose -1 SPD Stage for 5 activations. An enemy creature that starts their Activation touching the Hazard is @Affliction[slowed] 1.

system.description:
Trigger: The user enters combat.

Effect: Connection - Sticky Web. The user freely uses Sticky Web. Spider Web Hazards created by the user do not affect the user or their allies.
